data.title: Ralph Sharon
data.meta_description: Ralph Sharon. Soundtrack: Melody Club. Ralph Sharon was born on 17 September 1923 in Bethnal Green, London, England, UK. He was an actor, known for Melody Club (1949), An Evening at Home with Bernard Braden and Barbara Kelly (1951) and Tony Bennett Especial (1986). He was married to Linda H. Noone. He died on 31 March 2015 in Boulder, Colorado, USA.
data.text: Ralph Sharon was born on September 17, 1923 in Bethnal Green, London, England, UK. He was an actor, known for Melody Club (1949), An Evening at Home with Bernard Braden and Barbara Kelly (1951) and Tony Bennett Especial (1986). He was married to Linda H. Noone. He died on March 31, 2015 in Boulder, Colorado, USA.
